description.en: We got a big kick out of designing this, and you will get an even bigger one out of flying it.
description.ar: We got a big kick out of designing this, and you will get an even bigger one out of flying it.
description.br:
Perfeito para quem curte velocidade e carros irados!
"Droga, é o braia..."
description.cns: 我们在设计这款飞行器中获得了巨大的乐趣，而你将在飞行中获得更大的乐趣！
description.de: Dieses feurige Automobil bringt dich in höllischer Geschwindigkeit an dein Ziel.
description.fi: We got a big kick out of designing this, and you will get an even bigger one out of flying it.
description.fil: We got a big kick out of designing this, and you will get an even bigger one out of flying it.
description.fr: Ce concept-car volant vous propulse dans les airs.
description.id: Kami mendapat dorongan besar dari merancang ini, dan kamu akan mendapatkan yang lebih besar dengan menerbangkannya.
description.it: We got a big kick out of designing this, and you will get an even bigger one out of flying it.
description.jp: この車を設計するまでたくさんの苦労がありました。車が空を飛ぶ時代ですよ？喜ばない人なんていないでしょう！
description.kr: 우리는 이것을 디자인하는 데 큰 킥을 얻었고, 당신은 그것을 비행에서 더 큰 것을 얻을 것입니다.
description.nl: We got a big kick out of designing this, and you will get an even bigger one out of flying it.
description.pl: We got a big kick out of designing this, and you will get an even bigger one out of flying it.
description.ru: We got a big kick out of designing this, and you will get an even bigger one out of flying it.
description.sp: Nos encantó diseñar esto, y a ti te encantará todavía más usarlo para volar.
description.sw: We got a big kick out of designing this, and you will get an even bigger one out of flying it.
description.th: เราทำได้ดีมากในการออกแบบสิ่งนี้ และคุณจะได้สิ่งที่ยิ่งใหญ่กว่านั้นจากการบินมัน
description.tw: 我們從設計中獲得了很大的樂趣，您將從飛行中獲得更大的樂趣。
description.vi: Chúng tôi có một cú hích lớn khi thiết kế cái này, và bạn sẽ nhận được một cái còn lớn hơn khi bay nó.
